page.title: 13 WHIPPET RACING-contd .
page.content: When the pup has been vaccinated and is lead trained, you can start taking it out to the race track,so it can get used to the noise of the traps and the barking of the dogs.The best way to get a Whippet interested in the rag is to stand him behind the race traps and let see what is going on. If he pulls he is eager and interested. The muzzle-a light wire,fastened by a leather strap round the neck,should be put on for 10 minutes 6 times a day until it is used to it. At 6 months you can ask on race days for a "run-up",which means that you muzzle him, hold him until the rag moves and let him go.The rag or lure is an old car starter motor,which is connected to a battery and has a drum on to keep the string attached while its moving at speed.Now you are ready.
